00037 Menu::Menu(const std::string& STR_Name, const Help& CLI_Help)
00038   : SyntaxNode(STR_Name, CLI_Help),
00039     m_pcliHelp(NULL), m_pcliExit(NULL), m_pcliQuit(NULL), m_pcliPwm(NULL)
00040 {
00041 }

00047 Keyword& Menu::GetHelpNode(void)

00049     return *m_pcliHelp;

00086 
00087 void Menu::SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli)
00088 {
00089     SyntaxNode::SetCli(CLI_Cli);
00090     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Get help"));
00091         m_pcliHelp = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("help", cli_Help)));
00092         m_pcliHelp->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00093     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Exit menu " + GetKeyword()));
00094         m_pcliExit = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("exit", cli_Help)));
00095         m_pcliExit->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00096     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Quit"));
00097         m_pcliQuit = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("quit", cli_Help)));
00098         m_pcliQuit->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00099     {   Help cli_Help(Help().AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Print Working Menu"));
00100         m_pcliPwm = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("pwm", cli_Help)));
00101         m_pcliPwm->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00102 }
00103 
00104 const bool Menu::ExecuteReserved(const CommandLine& CLI_CommandLine) const
00105 {
00106     if (0) {}
00107     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetHelpNode())
00108     {
00109         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00110         {
00111             GetShell().DisplayHelp();
00112             return true;
00113         }
00114     }
00115     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetExitNode())
00116     {
00117         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00118         {
00119             GetShell().ExitMenu();
00120             return true;
00121         }
00122     }
00123     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetQuitNode())
00124     {
00125         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00126         {
00127             GetShell().Quit();
00128             return true;
00129         }
00130     }
00131     else if (& CLI_CommandLine[0] == & GetPwmNode())
00132     {
00133         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_CommandLine[1]))
00134         {
00135             GetShell().PrintWorkingMenu();
00136             return true;
00137         }
00138     }
00139 
00140     return false;
00141 }
00142 
00143 const bool Menu::Execute(const CommandLine& CLI_CommandLine) const
00144 {
00145     GetErrorStream() << "(no execution defined)" << endl;
00146     return true;
00147 }
